import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Request interceptor to add auth token

api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{var _error$response;if(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.status)===401){localStorage.removeItem('authToken');window.location.href='/login';}return Promise.reject(error);});// API endpoints
